EMailInformation.Subject: Your FocusPay Licenses: Attendant Assignment
EMailInformation.Message:
Dear @FIRST_NAME@,

You have been assigned a @PLATFORM_NAME@ POS license.
You can now perform transaction through any @PLATFORM_NAME@ POS application.
Any questions regarding the use of @PLATFORM_NAME@ account or need any additional assistance, please contact your administrator.
Alternatively, you can also reach @PLATFORM_NAME@ technical support at @PLATFORM_SUPPORT_PHONE_NUMBER@ or @PLATFORM_SUPPORT_EMAIL_ADDRESS@.

Sincerely,
@MERCHANT_NAME@
@PLATFORM_NAME@
Contact Sales at : @PLATFORM_SALES_EMAIL_ADDRESS@, @PLATFORM_SALES_PHONE_NUMBER@
@PLATFORM_WEBSITE@

Confidentiality Notice: The information contained in this message intended for the addressee is confidential and may constitute inside or non-public information. If you are not the addressee, please promptly delete this message and notify the sender.
